account.introduction: Welcome to 121. Please log in below.
account.wrong-credentials: Your email and/or password are not recognized. Please try again.
account.no-connection: Not able to access the server. Please check your internet connection and try again later.
account.unequal-passwords: The passwords you provided are not the same. Please try again.

login.introduction: Welcome to 121. Please log in below.
login.wrong-credentials: Your email and/or password are not recognized. Please try again.
login.no-connection: Not able to access the server. Please check your internet connection and try again later.

main-menu.introduction: You have access to the following actions. Please select one.

view-appointments.introduction: For the following timeslots appointments have been scheduled. Select a timeslot to see details.
view-appointments.appointments: These are the appointments for the chosen timeslot:

scan-qr.introduction: Now scan the QR-code of the PA to identify him/her in the system.
scan-qr.error: The scanned QR code did nog contain a DID or program number. You may have scanned the a wrong QR-code
scan-qr.unknownDidCombination: The scanned QR-code did not contain a valid combination of DID and program-ID. You can try scanning another QR-code.
scan-qr.conclusion: Thank you. You have scanned a valid combination of DID and program-ID.

validate-program.introduction: Below you see the PA's information for the specific program. Check it and if correct, confirm it. If not correct, tell the PA to change and resend it.
validate-program.conclusion: The Program credential has been created. As such there is no need, and thus no possibility, for you to see the PA's personal information any more here.
